column4: Hi. I'm currently trying to access my desktop (10.04 32bit) from my laptop (10.04 64bit) over a wired network. the connection is successful and i can see an initial screen (which is my main desktop) but when I click on anything I don't see any changes.
have you tried a vnc server and client through tightvnc?
i think tightvnc is the most user-friendly
